title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Educational Integration of Museum Digital Exhibits and Customized Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three educational advantages of digital interactive exhibitions
Learners can analyze the historical context of cultural heritage using customized interactive learning tools
Learners can evaluate educational mediation elements (visualization, interactivity, etc.) to consider when designing digital exhibitions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
